name: J'zargo
stunts: Overclock: Once per scene, add +2 to a Lore-based spell action; immediately create a minor collateral aspect (GM controls, no free invokes).
Showman: +2 to Rapport when the goal is to impress a crowd or win status.
notes: J'zargo is a competent mage whose primary danger is his ego. He's excellent leverage, and also an excellent accident generator.
combat_tactics: Opens with big pressure spells, tries to end fights quickly, and hates defensive play unless he can make it look heroic.
